scripts.public-files: cp -r src/client/assets public && cp src/client/apps/admin/js/ckeditor.js public/admin && cp src/client/apps/app/*.json public && npm run stylus && npm run views
scripts.views: cp -r src/client/apps/app/templates/* views/app && cp -r src/client/apps/admin/templates/* views/admin
scripts.build-app: NODE_PATH=. browserify -t hbsfy -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/client/apps/app/js/index.js > public/app/app.js
scripts.build-admin: NODE_PATH=. browserify -t hbsfy -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/client/apps/admin/js/index.js > public/admin/app.js
scripts.build: npm run build-app && npm run build-admin
scripts.start: npm run public && npm run public-files && npm run build && npm run dist && npm run server
